title: Conductive carbon fabric generation from single-step upcycling of textile waste
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3844-3853
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01722B, Paper
Carles Tortosa, Marina Navarro-Segarra, Pedro Guerrero, Koro de la Caba, Juan Pablo Esquivel
Feasibility demonstration of a single-step upcycling of textile waste into electrically conductive carbon textiles for their applicability in sustainable energy power sources; herein, an aqueous metal-free organic primary battery.
